DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety efficacy olopatadine hydrochloride / ketorolac tromethamine fix dose combination ophthalmic solution compare olopatadine hydrochloride ophthalmic solution patient seasonal allergic conjunctivitis .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Olopatadine Hydrochloride/Ketorolac Tromethamine Ophthalmic Solution Compared With Olopatadine Hydrochloride Ophthalmic Solution Patients With Seasonal Allergic Conjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis seasonal allergic conjunctivitis Ocular infection history ocular herpes infection History retinal detachment diabetic retinopathy Prior current use systemic topical steroid , NSAIDs , anticholinergic , immunosuppressant , antihistamine Ocular surgery within 8 week
